channel.title: [PI] ::interface command error

item.title: [PI] ::interface command error
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

[code]if (playerCommand.equals(“interface”)) {
int interfaceId = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(“interface”.length() + 1));
c.getPA().showInterface(interfaceId);

		}[/code]

That’s my interface command and it won’t show the interfaces I do… it spawns an object, this is my ::item command:

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
int amount = 1;
try {
amount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
			int itemID = 0;
			itemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			if ((itemID <= 20000) && (itemID >= 0)) {
				c.getItems().addItem(itemID, amount);		
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
				}
		}

}

[/code]

Read full topic
